Hey Bruce,
   
  Thanks! I am hooked now hehe
  Thank you again SOOOO much for sending me the 470....I love it!
  Am looking forward to listenning to the rest of my clips.
   
  Rhonda

bruce halliday <paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:
          Rhonda,
 
Now I know that I sent the box to the right person.
they are welcoming you on the first session. That's a great sign.
 
Also you are getting strong clear responses, you most likely have a favorable signal for them to use.
Looking forward to great things from you.
 
Keep up the good work.
 
Bruce


  Bruce Halliday 




    
---------------------------------
  From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com

Subject: [EVP-ITC] New file uploaded to EVP-ITC

      
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

File : /Rhonda's Folder/Kristins Shoutout.mp3 
Uploaded by : rhondak1973 <rhondak1973@...> 
Description : COME ON RUCKUS_KRISTIN_kristin woah i heard kristin_HI_hi_HELLO_hello!!! (Whats funny to me is my nickname is Ruckus and my CB handle is Little Ruckus) 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Rhonda%27s%20Folder/Kristins%20Shoutout.mp3
